definition: body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
paragraph/section/segment/stage (of a process)/classifier for stories, periods of time, lengths of thread etc
to get off one's high horse (idiom)/to dispense with posturing (and adopt a more humble or empathetic attitude)

sentences.english: Accentuate your curves and womanly body.
sentences.chinese: 强调你自己妖娆女人的身段。

sentences.english: The fashion sets her figure off to advantage.
sentences.chinese: 那件时装把她的身段衬托得更加优美。

sentences.english: They should change this bad habit and condescend to be pleased what is pleasing.
sentences.chinese: 他们应该改变这种坏习惯，放下身段，与众同乐。

sentences.english: The figure of a girl fills out at puberty.
sentences.chinese: 姑娘的身段在青春期变得丰满。

sentences.english: Her beautiful hair and figure make a compensation for her ugly face.
sentences.chinese: 她的秀发和优美的身段弥补了她丑陋的面孔。

sentences.english: The black dress flattered her figure.
sentences.chinese: 这身黑衣服极好地显示出她的身段。

sentences.english: The willowy one is my youngest daughter.
sentences.chinese: 身段高挑的那个便是我的小女儿。

sentences.english: Its probably the first thing｜that catches my attention about a woman.
sentences.chinese: 身段可能是一个女人最先吸引我目光的地方。

sentences.english: Buy what fits and be objective about what length flatters your body type.
sentences.chinese: 买称身的而且适合你身段长度的衣服。

sentences.english: He is a miserable little person.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个哀怜的身段矮小的人。

sentences.english: That dress doesn't do much for her figure.
sentences.chinese: 那件连衣裙并不怎么能够衬出她的身段。

sentences.english: She was tall and big, a typical built from the Northern region of China.
sentences.chinese: 她又高又大，有著一个中国北方的典型身段。

sentences.english: Her figure was slighter and therefore more seductive than Natalie.
sentences.chinese: 她的身段比较苗条，因此比娜塔丽更加诱人。

definition: (of a woman) to have nice curves/buxom/shapely
slender waist/fig. pretty woman/mortise and tenon joint on a coffin
sweet, fair, and graceful (of a woman)/a seductive woman/secluded (bower)
slender and supple waist/lithe body/feminine pose
